name: Luigi Floating on an Egg Over the Sea (Socksmakepeoplesexy.Net)
name_original: Luigi Floating on an Egg Over the Sea (Socksmakepeoplesexy.Net)
description:
Enjoy a relaxing ride across the sea with all of your favorite friends.

Controls

W, A, S, D, or the arrow keys to move Luigi! That's all there is to it!

Press F at any time to toggle Fullscreen and Windowed setting.

Features
  • Luigi!
  • An Egg!
  • The Sea!
  • I really don't know what more you could want!
